long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Battle City is a classic and action-packed game available as a Chrome extension. Immerse yourself in a nostalgic gaming experience as you take control of a tank and defend your base against waves of enemy tanks. Your mission is to strategically navigate through an arena filled with obstacles, destroy enemy tanks, and protect your base from being destroyed. Collect power-ups and upgrades to enhance your tank's firepower and defenses.
 With its retro graphics, intense gameplay, and challenging levels, Battle City offers an addictive and thrilling gaming experience. Test your tactical skills, precision aiming, and quick reflexes as you engage in exciting tank battles. Whether you're a fan of retro games or looking for an adrenaline-pumping challenge, Battle City on Chrome Extension will keep you entertained for hours. Get ready to dominate the battlefield and become the ultimate tank commander in this classic game.
